name: Nerd Face
baseMeaning: A yellow face with large glasses, buck teeth, and a smile.
tldr: Embracing nerdiness, or mocking someone for being too technical/pedantic.

contextMeanings.meaning: Mocking someone for being too technical or pedantic.

platformNotes.note: Often used to mock overly pedantic responses.
Common in tech communities - self-deprecating nerd humor.
Can be playful self-deprecation about technical work.

generationalNotes.note: Primarily used to mock pedantic behavior or 'well actually' types.
Mix of self-deprecating nerd pride and mocking pedantry.
May not understand the mocking connotation.

warnings.title: Can be dismissive
warnings.description: Using this in response to someone can imply you're mocking their knowledge or correction.

seoTitle: Nerd Face Emoji Meaning - What Does  Really Mean?
seoDescription: Learn what the nerd face emoji  really means in modern texting. Nerd pride or mocking pedantry. Complete context guide.
